SEARCH
Package nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.managers

Class PowerBlockManager

java.lang.Object
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.api.restartable.Restartable
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.managers.PowerBlockManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
IRestartable, StructureDeletionManager.IDeletionListener
@Singleton public final class PowerBlockManager extends Restartable implements StructureDeletionManager.IDeletionListener
Manages all power block interactions.
Author:
Pim

      Retrieves all structures whose powerblocks exist in the same chunk as a given location.
      Parameters:
      loc - The location.
      worldName - The name of the world to search in.
      Returns:

    • isAnimatedArchitectureWorld

      public boolean isAnimatedArchitectureWorld(String worldName)
      Checks if a world is a AnimatedArchitecture world. In other words, it checks if a world contains more than 0 structures.
      Parameters:
      worldName - The name of the world.
      Returns:
      True if the world contains at least 1 structure.

      newPos - The new position.
